item.title: Oil edges lower as focus turns to OPEC response to Trump’s call for more output
item.description: Oil futures steadied Thursday, a day after the U.S. benchmark saw its lowest settlement of the new year.

item.title: Apple is the stock everyone loves to hate. Don’t sell even if earnings are dismal, analyst says.
item.description: A disappointing quarter or even three of sales or earnings is no reason to sell Apple stock, says the CIO from Birinyi Associates.

item.title: Dow to cut 1,500 jobs as it struggles to get back to profitability
item.description: The company is also optimistic that it will see demand growth in certain markets.

item.title: ‘I have a new lease on life’: I sold my business for $130,000. It’s the first time I’m not living paycheck to paycheck. What should I do with this money?
item.description: “I have $150,000 left on my mortgage with 7.3% interest.”

item.title: ‘Jeopardy!’ host Ken Jennings gradually expands his real estate portfolio
item.description: Jennings, who hails from Seattle, now hosts both “Celebrity Jeopardy!” and the original “Jeopardy!,” possibly earning $4 million a year.
